name: @psysecgroup/threaded-sqlite-write
description: Extreme speed SQLite bulk insertions spread across multiple threads then compiled into a single SQLite file.
author: The PsySec Group

scripts.build: npx esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --external:better-sqlite3 --platform=node --minify --outfile=dist/index.js && npx esbuild src/insert.ts --bundle --platform=node --external:better-sqlite3 --minify --outfile=dist/insert.js
scripts.compile: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
